description: Provides a resource to create a CLB instance.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AddressIpVersion.description: IP version, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are `ipv4`, `ipv6` and `IPv6FullChain`.

ClbName.description: Name of the CLB. The name can only contain Chinese characters, English letters, numbers, underscore and hyphen '-'.

InternetBandwidthMaxOut.description: Max bandwidth out, only applicable to open CLB. Valid value ranges is [1, 2048]. Unit is MB.

InternetChargeType.description: Internet charge type, only applicable to open CLB. Valid values are `TRAFFIC_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR`, `BANDWIDTH_POSTPAID_BY_HOUR` and `BANDWIDTH_PACKAGE`.

LoadBalancerPassToTarget.description: Whether the target allow flow come from clb. If value is true, only check security group of clb, or check both clb and backend instance security group.

MasterZoneId.description: Setting master zone id of cross available zone disaster recovery, only applicable to open CLB.

NetworkType.description: Type of CLB instance. Valid values: `OPEN` and `INTERNAL`.

ProjectId.description: ID of the project within the CLB instance, `0` - Default Project.

SecurityGroups.description: Security groups of the CLB instance. Supports both `OPEN` and `INTERNAL` CLBs.

SlaveZoneId.description: Setting slave zone id of cross available zone disaster recovery, only applicable to open CLB. this zone will undertake traffic when the master is down.

SubnetId.description: Subnet ID of the CLB. Effective only for CLB within the VPC. Only supports `INTERNAL` CLBs. Default is `ipv4`.

Tags.description: The available tags within this CLB.

TargetRegionInfoRegion.description: Region information of backend services are attached the CLB instance. Only supports `OPEN` CLBs.

TargetRegionInfoVpcId.description: Vpc information of backend services are attached the CLB instance. Only supports `OPEN` CLBs.

ZoneId.description: Available zone id, only applicable to open CLB.
